features: 4-layer Dimension-Polyant™ fabric is durable, light and waterproof making for a rugged, lightweight and water-resistant pack.
Contoured ventilated back panel with lightweight frame sheet supports loads.
Compression strap combined with fully removable floating lid creates stable exterior rope carry or over-load option.
Flat base design allows easier loading while padded base construction protects contents and increases durability.
Dual density shoulder straps provide ample support.
Forward-Access™ gear loop unique shape keeps clipped gear easily reachable.
tech_specs.\u2022 Primary Fabric: Dimension-Polyant™ 4L Vx21 Terrain X-Pac (57% Nylon, 43% Polyester)
